channel.title: elizabeth yan's blog
channel.description: thoughts on design, machine learning, and philosophy

item.title: me, boiled down
item.description: i downplay every single one of my achievements. i don't mean to, but somehow, it always comes back to these three words: "onto the next."

item.title: fearing, but also looking forward
item.description: how do i verbalize this? i've been thinking about this for a while, unsure of how to put pen to paper.

item.title: the hardest thing to understand in this world is our own feelings.
item.description: "we are a mosaic of everyone we've ever loved." i've been thinking about this quote a lot more often recently.

item.title: dump.
item.description: small things that are on my mind.
